ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرْسِلْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Detain him and his brother and send out marshals to the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "Put him and his brother off (awhile) and send out heralds to the cities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then they advised Pharaoh: 'Put off Moses and his brother for a while, and send forth heralds to your cities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The others suggested holding Moses and his brother off and sending to all the cities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “Stop him and his brother, and send announcers to the cities to gather people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Put him and his brother off (for a time), and send callers to the cities to collect"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Put him off and his brother, and send collectors into the cities:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Put him and his brother off a while, and send among the cities musterers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said (unto Pharaoh): Put him off (a while) - him and his brother - and send into the cities summoners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Let him and his brother wait awhile, and send into the cities summoners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: put him and his bro ther off, and send unto the cities callers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Put him and his brother off for a while, and send heralds to the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Keep him and his brother in suspense (for a while); and send to the cities men to collect-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Put him and his brother off (for a time), and send callers (men) to the cities to collect (and) -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Others said: 'Put them off a while, he and his brother, and send forth to your cities gatherers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Put him off, and his brother, and send heralds to the cities.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:111] They said, ‘Put him and his brother off a while, postpone [any decision regarding] their affair, and send into the towns summoners, gatherers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said (unto Pharaoh): Put him off (a while) him and his brother) do not kill them (and send into the cities summoners) soldiers,
